Title: Requires all individuals who ride upon or operate an electric scooter to wear a helmet
Summary: Requires all individuals who ride upon or operate an electric scooter to wear a helmet that meets standards established by the commissioner of the department of motor vehicles.
LawCode: Amd ยง1286, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to requiring all individuals who ride upon or operate an electric scooter to wear a helmet
